string-array.name: cpu1
string-array.item: AMD Ryzen 9 3900X

# of Cores : 12
 # of Threads : 24
 Base Clock 3.8 GHz
 Max Boost Clock 4.6 GHz
 CPU Socket: AMD AM4
 Default TDP/ TDP : 105W

Higher speeds. More memory. Wider bandwidth. You must push every lever, squeeze every ounce, and leave nothing on the table. AMD's 3rd Gen Ryzen processor was designed to break expectations and set a new standard for high-performance processors.
 
 The 3rd Gen AMD Ryzen processor is built using the world's most advanced manufacturing technology to deliver winning performance while keeping your system astonishingly cool & quiet.
 
 3rd Gen Ryzen processors feature support for the world's first PCIe 4.0 ready platform2, enabling the most advanced motherboards, graphics, and storage technologies available.

string-array.name: cpu2
string-array.item: AMD Ryzen 5 3600

# of Cores : 6
 # of Threads :12
 Base Clock 3.6 GHz
 Max Boost Clock 4.2 GHz
 CPU Socket: AMD AM4
 Default TDP/ TDP : 65W

Elite caliber experiences on competitive titles. Simultaneous play and capture from one powerful system. Experience smooth & responsive cutting-edge VR content. Power and performance for developers and enthusiasts alike. AMD\'s mainstream computing platform, updated with the new PCIe® 4.0 Ready X570 based chipset. Software that combines the speed of your SSD with the capacity of your hard disk into a single, fast, easy-to-manage drive. With AMD SenseMI technology, Ryzen™ processors use true machine intelligence to accelerate performance. The Simple and Powerful Overclocking Utility for AMD Ryzen™ processors. AMD Ryzen™ 5 Processors are available in two options: with powerful built-in Radeon™ Vega graphics, or without built-in graphics for users who want to use a discrete graphics card.

string-array.name: cpu3
string-array.item: AMD Ryzen Threadripper 3990X

# of Cores : 64
 # of Threads : 128
 Base Clock 2.9 GHz
 Max Boost Clock Up to 4.3 GHz
 CPU Socket: AMD sTRX4
 Default TDP/ TDP : 280W

64 cores provide an astonishing 128 threads of simultaneous multi-processing power, while 288MB of combined cache and vast I/O from the enthusiast-grade AMD TRX40 platform work together to deliver incredible performance.
 
 
	- 64 cores and 128 threads for lightning-fast rendering workloads. 
	- An unprecedented 88 total PCIe® 4.0 lanes to meet large GPU and NVMe needs. 
	- Up to 288MB of combined cache for rapid access to large data sets. 
	- Quad-channel DDR4 with available ECC support for reliable throughput 
 
The new AMD TRX40 motherboards feature the debut of advanced PCIe® 4.0 connectivity on high-end desktop, delivering more bandwidth for creators than ever before. Combine up to six NVMe disks in for superlative speed or rock-solid redundancy with Ryzen Threadripper processors. Want even more? Get double the bandwidth with PCIe 4.0, exclusively for high-end desktop on AMD TRX40 motherboards.

string-array.name: cpu4
string-array.item: AMD Ryzen Threadripper 3970X

# of Cores : 32
 # of Threads : 64
 Base Clock 3.7 GHz
 Max Boost Clock 4.5 GHz
 CPU Socket: AMD sTRX4
 Default TDP/ TDP : NA

Do everything, all at the same time. Render. Stream. Compile. Encode. Work and Play. It's the ultimate desktop platform for creators, featuring the world's most powerful desktop processors.
 
 Take advantage of all 32 cores and 64 threads for unprecedented multitasking power to edit footage, animate characters, and fine tune a design without sacrificing your vision.
 
 Experience incredible performance with a massive amount of on-chip memory, powerful enough to simultaneously stream your game content to your audience, without skipping frames; strong enough to handle your creative vision in three dimensions; and fast enough to compile your code while you play.
 
 Coupled with the new AMD TRX40 desktop platform, 3rd Gen AMD Ryzen Threadripper processors deliver bleeding-edge efficiency and expandability - including next-gen PCIe 4.0 connectivity.

string-array.name: cpu6
string-array.item: Intel Coffee Lake Core i9 9900K

# of Cores : 8
 # of Threads : 16
 Base Clock 3.6GHz
 Max Boost Clock 5.0GHz
 CPU Socket: Intel LGA1151
 Default TDP/ TDP :95 W

9th Gen Intel Core i9-9900K desktop processor with Intel Turbo Boost Technology 2.0 offers powerful performance for gaming, creating and productivity. Thermal solution NOT included in the box.
 
 
	- 8 Cores / 16 Threads 
	- 3.60 GHz up to 5.00 GHz / 16 MB Cache 
	- Compatible only with Motherboards based on Intel 300 Series Chipsets 
	- Intel Optane Memory Supported 
	- Intel UHD Graphics 630

string-array.name: cpu7
string-array.item: Intel Coffee Lake Core i5 9400F

# of Cores : 6
 # of Threads : 6
 Base Clock 2.90 GHz
 Max Boost Clock4.10 GHz
 CPU Socket: Intel LGA1151
 Default TDP/ TDP : 65W

Now everyday computer tasks can happen faster. Edit photos and videos seamlessly. between programs and windows quickly.\n \n High processing throughput and improved performance. 9MB integrated cache in the CPU which provides fast access to heavily used data and instructions.Intel Identity Protection Technology included in the device which provides a simple and secure technology for protecting access to customer and business data from threats and fraud. Additionally, it contains the Intel Turbo Boost Technology which dynamically increases the processor\'s frequency as needed by taking advantage of thermal and power headroom to give you a burst of speed when you need it, and increased energy efficiency when you don\'t.

Higher speeds. More memory. Wider bandwidth. You must push every lever, squeeze every ounce, and leave nothing on the table. AMD's 3rd Gen Ryzen™ processor was designed to break expectations and set a new standard for high-performance processors.
 
 The 3rd Gen AMD Ryzen processor is built using the world's most advanced manufacturing technology to deliver winning performance while keeping your system astonishingly cool & quiet.

string-array.name: cpu9
string-array.item: Intel Coffee Lake Core i3 9100

# of Cores : 4
 # of Threads : 4
 Base Clock 3.60 GHz
 Max Boost Clock 4.20 GHz
 CPU Socket: Intel LGA1151
 Default TDP/ TDP : 65 W

Experience powerful performance and seamless computing for your everyday tasks. Packed with quad computing cores (quad threads), the Core i3-9100 powers through your day-to-day workloads like office tasks, media streaming, HD entertainment and more. Plus, Intel UHD Graphics 630 delivers decent graphics performance to meet your average needs.\n \n Amazing performance at a budget-friendly price. What will be more amazing is what you can do with the Intel Core i3-9100 processor.

string-array.name: cpu10
string-array.item: Intel Xeon W-2195

# of Cores :18
 # of Threads : 36
 Base Clock 2.3GHz
 Max Boost Clock 4.3GHz
 CPU Socket: Intel LGA2066
 Default TDP/ TDP : 140 W

Up to 18 cores and 36 threads with up to 4.5 GHz Intel® Turbo Boost Technology 2.0 frequency, combined with up to 512 GB DDR4 ECC 2666 MHz memory support delivering rapid workload loading and processing.
 
 Up to 48 lanes of PCI Express 3.0 for graphics, storage and network expandability. Enhanced media performance with Intel® Virtual RAID on Chip (Intel® VROC) combining RAID with NVMe drives directly off the CPU.
 
 Built-in reliability, availability and serviceability to ensure platform and data integrity. Intel® vPro™ technology delivers hardware-enhanced security, protection, and remote manageability.
